GSP33brsgor4u:9: sādhanaṃ nirūpya phalaṃ nirūpyata ityadhyāyayorhatuphalabhāvaṃ saṃgatimāha-tṛtīya iti /

GSP33brsgor4u:17: mokṣe viśeṣābhāvavacchravaṇādāvāvṛttiviśeṣo nāstīti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāvāntarasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /

GSP33brsgor4u:38: ādityasyaikasyaivodgīthe saṃpādyopāsanānmama tvameka eva putro 'sīti kauṣītakiḥ putramuvāca,

GSP33brsgor4u:48: tayoḥ parokṣajñānahetutvasvābhāvyādāvṛttāvapi na sākṣātkāraḥ syāditi pariharati-nāsakṛdapīti /

GSP33brsgor4u:59: āropitāṃśanirāsāya na me deho nendriyamityabhyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:72: nanvāvṛttau niyogātpravṛttirvācyā tathā ca niyuktatvabuddherakartrātmadhīrna syādityata āha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:82: pūrvatra dhyānāderāvṛttiruktā tāmupajīvya tattvajñānārthaṃ dhyānāvṛttikāle kimahaṃ brahmeti dhyātavyamuta matsvāmīśvara ityaikyabhedamānābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-ya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:88: kiñca kimīśvarasya jīvamātratvamaikyaṃ jīvasyeśvaramātratvaṃ veti vikalpya krameṇa dūṣayati-īśvarasya cetyādinā /

GSP33brsgor4u:112: yathā brahmaṇyabhedasattavādahaṅgraha ukta evaṃ pratīkeṣvapi brahmavikāratayā jīvābhinnabrahmābhinnatvājjīvābhedasattvenāhaṅgrahaḥ kārya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:120: vikārasya brahmaṇā svarūpaikyāyogādbādhenaikyaṃ vācyaṃ pratīkabādhe copāstividhirna syādityarthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:124: ato jīvapratīkayoḥ svarūpabhedādahaṅgrahe vidhyaśravaṇācca nāhaṅgraha iti phalitamāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:125: yathā rucakasvastikayoḥ suvarṇātmanaikye 'pi mitho naikyaṃ tathā jīvapratīkayoḥ brahmātmanaikye 'pi bhedaḥ samaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:126: yadica dharmivyatirekeṇa tayorabhāvaniścayādvastvaikyaṃ tadopāsanoccheda ukta ityarthaḥ //4//

GSP33brsgor4u:142: siddhānte tu vikāradṛṣṭyā brahmaṇa upāsyatve nikarṣaprāptau satyāṃ phalavattvāsiddhervikārā evotkṛṣṭabrahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti phalam /
GSP33brsgor4u:143: kiñca laukikanyāyāviruddhārthasaṃbhave viruddhārtho na grāhyaḥ pratyavāyaprasaṅgāt /

GSP33brsgor4u:148: itiśabdaśiraskaḥ śabdaḥ samabhivyāhṛtakriyālakṣaka iti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:153: kiñca yaddṛṣṭyā vikārasyotkarṣaḥ tasya brahmaṇo viśeṣaṇatve 'pyupāsyatvaṃ cātītyāha-īdṛśaṃ ceti //5//
GSP33brsgor4u:161: tairevādiriti upadrava iti ca bhaktidvayādhikaiḥ saptāṃśa sāmeti bhedaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:170: tatra yadi ṛksāmātmakayoḥ karmāṅgayoḥ pṛthivyagnidṛṣṭhiḥ syāt,

GSP33brsgor4u:181: yathā svatantrapaśuphalasyāpi godohanasya aṅgadvārāpekṣayaiva phalamiṣṭaṃ tadvallokādiphaleṣūpāsaneṣvapi karmāpūrvāṅgadvāraiva phalakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brsgor4u:189: siddhādityādyātmanā karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭau karmatvahāniḥ syādityata āha-ādityādibhāveneti /
GSP33brsgor4u:195: tathā cātra ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyāgnidṛṣṭipakṣe 'pi ṛksāmapadābhyāṃ svavācyārthe draṣṭavyatākhyaparamparāsaṃbandhena pṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:196: nanu pratīkavācipadasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā,
GSP33brsgor4u:198: tathāpi ṛksāmasaṃbandhātpṛthivyagnyorevaitasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāmeti mukhyayoḥ pṛthaguktestadetasyāmityatrāpi tayorgrahe punaruktiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:199: ataḥ pratīkābhedadṛṣṭyā pṛthivyagnyoḥ pratīkasaṃnidhānāttayoreva pratīkapadaprayogaḥ kṛtastabhedadārḍhyāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:201: sthitaprayogasya nimittaṃ kimapi vācyaṃ na tu nimittamastīti prayoga āpādya iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:206: sāmātmanā lokānupāsīteti dvitīyāsaptamyorbhaṅgastvayā kāryastato varaṃ lokātmanā sāmopāsīteti saptamīmātrabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:207: eteneti ekavibhaktibhaṅgalāghavena prāṇātmanā gāyatraṃ sāmopāsyamiti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:359: atra pūrvapakṣe karmāṅgopāstihīnakarmaṇo jñānārthatvāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti bhedaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:397: pūrvapakṣe karaṇānāṃ svarūpalayānmṛtamātrasya muktiḥ, siddhānte tu saṃsārasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:400: uttaratra hi sūtrakṛttattvavida indriyāṇāṃ svarūpalayaṃ vakṣyati tadbalādihādhyāhāra ucitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:402: prakṛtāveva vikāralaya iti nyāyaviruddhārthaṃ śrutirapi na brūta iti siddhāntayati-atatprakṛtitvāditi /

GSP33brsgor4u:411: sarvendriyavṛttilayaścediṣṭastarhi vāṅmanasīti pṛthaksūtraṃ kimarthamityata āha-sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāmiti //2//

GSP33brsgor4u:421: āgṛhītā bāhyendriyavṛttayo yena tattathā līnendriyavṛttikaṃ mano 'pi vṛttilayenaiva prāṇe līyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:430: uktanyāyasiddhaṃ prāṇasyāpi vṛttilayamupajīvya 'prāṇastejasi'iti śruterūpagamādiśruteśca saṃśayamuktvā jīve layaṃ vināpi upagamādisaṃbhava iti pūrvapakṣayati-sthitamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:432: siddhānte tu bhūtopahita jīvalakṣakatvamiti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-sa prakṛta ityādinā /

GSP33brsgor4u:435: yathā yātrecchāvantaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyā upagacchantyevameva paralokaṃ jigamiṣuṃ jīvaṃ sarve prāṇā abhimukhyenāyāntītyupagamaḥ śrutaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:438: jīvasya prāptavyaphalāvagamāya hi vijñānasāhityaśrutyāḥ mukhyaprāṇasahitakaraṇānāṃ jīve sthitirbhātītyarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:443: yadyapi prāṇasya tejasyavyavadhānena layaḥ śrutastathāpyubhayaśrutyanugrahāya prāṇo jīve līyate,

GSP33brsgor4u:622: bhagavadārādhanabuddhyānuṣṭhitaṃ karma yogaḥ 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /

GSP33brsgor4u:746: evaṃ siddhāntamuktvā tena nirastaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-kaṃ punarityādinā //9 // //10 // //11 // //12//

GSP33brsgor4u:762_0: tattatra brahmaloke vidyāvidhīnenāparājitā pūrasti brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhasya tenaiva
GSP33brsgor4u:762_1: prabhuṇāṃ vimitaṃ nirmitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśmāsti tatpratipadyate vidvāniti daharavidyāyāṃ

GSP33brsgor4u:769_0: yadyapyetadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahmetyādiśrutiṣu prayogasāmyādbrahmaśabda
GSP33brsgor4u:769_1: ubhayatra rūḍhatayā mukhyaḥeva tathāpi pūrṇe parasminnavayavārthasya niratiśayamahattvasya
GSP33brsgor4u:771: yathā vidyāsaṃbaddhasuṣumnāstutyarthaṃ tadasaṃbaddhanāḍyantarakīrtanaṃ tathā paravidyāstutyarthaṃ tatprakaraṇe 'pyaparavidyāśrayagatikīrtanaṃ yujyate,
GSP33brsgor4u:772: gatiṃ vināpi hi paravidyā niratiśayaphalā tasyāṃ tvaparavidyāphalaṃ gatisādhyamantarbhavatīti stutilābhādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:778: sarvagatasya svātmabhūtasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāradeśāddeśāntareṇa tatkālātkālāntareṇa viśiṣṭatayā gantavyatvaṃ syāditi pṛthivīvayodṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:780: nanu yuktaṃ bhūvayasoḥ prāptayorapi deśāntarakālāntaraviśiṣṭatvena gantavyatvaṃ tayorgantṛbhinnatvāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:782: yā prāptā bhūḥ sā na gantavyā yacca gantavyaṃ deśāntaraṃ tattvaprāptamiti kutaḥ prāptasya gantavyatā vayaso 'pi kālāntare 'bhivyaktimātraṃ na gantavyatvamiti vastugatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:783: aṅgīkṛtya viśiṣṭabhūvayasorgantavyatāṃ parabrahmaṇo deśakālavaiśiṣṭyābhāvānna kathañcidapi gantavyatetyāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:784: 'anādimatparaṃ brahma'ityādyā smṛtirdṛśyaviśeṣasya dṛśi kalpitatvāddṛgātmano nirviśeṣateti nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:785: saguṇameva brahma sūtrātmāpekṣayā paraṃ gantavyaṃ, nirviśeṣaṃ tu nāstyeveti śaṅkate-jagadutpattīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:792: na kevalaṃ nyāyāccheṣatā kintu śrutyāpītyāha-pratyakṣaṃ tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:793: tatra mūlakāraṇe brahmaṇyetacchuṅgaṃ jagadātmakaṃ kāryamutpannamityupakramya tena śuṅgena tanmūlamanvicchetyupasaṃhāre sata eva jñeyatvamuktaṃ chāndogye /
GSP33brsgor4u:794: tathā taittirīyake 'pi jagajjanmādyanuvādena brahmaṇa eva jñeyatvaṃ darśitamataḥ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ śrutyaiva nirviśeṣadhīśeṣatā bhātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:797: evaṃ gantavyālocanayā gatiṃ nirasya gantrālocanayāpi nirasyati-gatikalpanāyāṃ cetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:802: vikārāvayavarūpajīvaviśiṣṭasyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthiratvājjīvānāṃ gatyāgatī na syātām /
GSP33brsgor4u:807: bhinnayorabhedo mukhyo na yukto virodhāditi pariharati-neti /
GSP33brsgor4u:808: kiñca pakṣatrayamapyayuktaṃ saṃsāritvasya tāttvikajīvabhāvasya nāśe tāttvivajīvasvarūpanāśaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:809: nacāsmābhiriva tvayā brahmātmatvaṃ jīvasya tāttvikarūpamaṅgīkṛtaṃ yadasya saṃsāranāśe 'pi na naśyedityāha-sarveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:811: saṃsārābhāvaḥ kila mokṣaḥ sa ca karmābhāvamātreṇa setsyatīti kramajaḍānāṃ matamudbhāvya nirasyati-yattvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:815: nanu tavāpyetattarkamātramekasmiñjanmanyanekaviruddhaphalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhogāyogādastyavaśiṣṭaṃ karma janmāntarasya nimittamityāśaṅkya tatra mānamāha-karmaśeṣasadbhāvasiddhiśceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:816: santvanārabdhaphalāni puṇyapāpāni teṣāṃ nityādyanuṣṭhānena kṣayānna janmāntaramiti śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:818: pāpasyāpi sarvātmanā puṇyanāśyatve mānaṃ nāstīti saṃcitapuṇyapāpābhyāṃ janmāntaraṃ durvāramityāha-tannetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:819: kriyamāṇanityādināpi janma syāt, karmaṇā pitṛloka ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ, smṛteścetyāha-naca nityeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:820: pratyavāyanirāsārthe nityādyācāre satyanu paścātphalāntaraṃ niṣpadyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:824: jñānaṃ vinā dehapāte mokṣa eveti niścayālābhāttvatpakṣe kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:825: brahmabhinnasya jīvasyaṃ kartṛtvādisvabhāvasya mokṣāśāpi na yuktetyāha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:826: kartṛtvādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ na svabhāvaḥ kintu tacchaktiriti śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:827_0: kāryagamyāyāḥ śakteḥ kāryasyātyantānutpāde sattvamayuktamataḥ śaktisattve tadviṣayasya
GSP33brsgor4u:827_1: kāryasyādṛṣṭadeśakālādinimittānāṃ cātmanā śaktidvārā nityasaṃbaddhatvānmokṣo na syāditi
GSP33brsgor4u:833: kathaṃ tarhi kaiścitparaviṣayatvaṃ gateruktamityāśaṅkya bhrāntetyāha-tatra parāpareti /
GSP33brsgor4u:834: praśnapūrvakaṃ parāparabrahmavibhāgaṃ vadannaparabrahmaṇi gaterarthavattvamāha-kiṃ dve ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:839: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca | BBs_4,3.15 |
GSP33brsgor4u:844: idānīmapatīkopāsakānāmeva mārgo na sarveṣāṃ vikāropāsakānāmityubhayathābhāvoktau pūrvoktavirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:848: aniyamaḥ sarvāsāmiti sūtre sarvaśabdasya pratīkopāsakānyaparatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:849: yadyapi pratīkadhyāyināṃ pitṛyāṇatṛtīyasthānayorapraveśādarcirādimārgo vācyastathāpi teṣāṃ vidyutparyantameva gamanamastu na brahmaprāptirbrahmakratutvābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:850: yo yat dhyāyati sa tatprāpnoti hi tatkratunyāyaḥ śrutimūlaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:851: pratīkeṣu ca nāmādiṣu dhyeyeṣu brahmaṇo guṇatvāt, na brahmadhyāyitvamasti /
GSP33brsgor4u:852: asya ca nyāyasya pañcāgnividyāyāmāhatyavādātpratyakṣavacanādbādha iṣṭa iti sūtrabhāṣyārthaḥ //15//
GSP33brsgor4u:857: kiñca pratīkatāratamyena phalatāratamyaśruterna pratīkadhyāyināṃ brahmaprāptirityāha-viśeṣaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:858: tasmādasati vacane brahmadhyāyina eva brahmagantāra iti siddham //16//
GSP33brsgor4u:875: svaśabdaśrutibādhito nyāyaḥ abhiniṣpattiśca sākṣātkāravṛttyabhiprāyā bandhadhvaṃsajanmanyaupacārikveveti matvā siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:876: mokṣasya phalatvena prāptāgantukatvanirāsārthaḥ svaśabda iti yuktaṃ svīyavācitve 'tvanarthakānuvādaḥ syādityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:882: jāgarite hyāndhyādidehadharmavānbhavati svapne tu hata eva kenacit /
GSP33brsgor4u:885: bandhadaśāyāṃ kaluṣitātmanā tiṣṭhati mokṣe tu vigalitākhiladuḥkhaḥ paritaḥ pradyotamānapūrṇānandātmanāvatiṣṭhata iti mahān viśeṣa ityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor4u:892: kāryaṃ prāpto 'pi muktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na cānativṛtta iti //3//
GSP33brsgor4u:898: svarūpasthitamuktamupajīvya vādivivādāt brahmabhedābhedasaṃśaye satyatyantabhedaṃ pūrvapakṣamuktvā siddhāntamāha-yasyeti //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:903_0: brāhmeṇa jaiminiḥuktaṃ brahma svarūpamupajīvya sa kiṃ satyena sarvajñatvādidharmeṇa
GSP33brsgor4u:903_1: yuktastiṣṭhati uta dharmasya śaśaśṛṅgavadatyantāsattvāccinmātrātmanā tiṣṭhati kiṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:908: sarvajña ityādistu vyapadeśo 'yaṃ hi noddeśaḥ vidhyabhāvānnāpi vidhiḥ siddhavannirdeśādityarthaḥ //5//
GSP33brsgor4u:914: citiścaitanyaṃ, śabdajñānādyo vikalpo 'sanpratyayastajjāḥ atyantāsanta iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor4u:916: cinmātre mukte jakṣaṇādiśrutiḥ kathaṃ tatrāha-ata eva ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:921: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ | BBs_4,4.7 |
GSP33brsgor4u:926: ye īśvaradharmāsta eva cidātmani mukte jīvāntarairvyavahriyante iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:929: kintu tadaṃśanāśenāṃśārabdhādhyātmikaśarīradvayābhimānino muktāvaṃśāntaropādhikā jīvā vyavahartāra iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:930: tarhi nānavidyāpakṣa eva kuto nādriyate jīvabhedasyāvaśyakatvāditi cet /
GSP33brsgor4u:932: prakṛtinānātvaṃ pratijīvaṃ prapañcabheda ityādyaprāmāṇikānekārthagauravāditi sarvavṛddhasaṃmata ekāvidyāpakṣa eva śreyān,
GSP33brsgor4u:942: na caivakāravirodhaḥ saṃkalpena sāmagryā ayogavyavacchedena saulabhyārthatvāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:945: siddhānte tu vidyābalena saṃkalpasyaiva bhogapuṣṭikaratvasiddhiriti bedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:946_0: kiñca yadi bhogasaṃkalpānantaramapi yatnāntarasādhyanimittāpekṣā syāttarhi nimittaprāpteḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:946_1: prāgjātasaṃkalpasya vandhyatvaṃ syādbhoge vilambāttataḥ satyasaṃkalpaśruterna yatnāntarāpekṣetyāha-nimittāntaramapi tviti //8 //
GSP33brsgor4u:952: īśvaradharma eva viduṣyāvirbhūta iti na saṃkalpabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ //9//
GSP33brsgor4u:956: abhāvaṃ bādarir āha hy evam | BBs_4,4.10 |
GSP33brsgor4u:958: evakāravanmanaseti viśeṣaṇenānyayogavyavacchedāddehādyabhāva iti pūrvapakṣayati-abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam /
GSP33brsgor4u:959: atrāpi vādivivādātsaṃśayaḥ, tatra dehādayo na santyeva sadā santyeveti ca pakṣadvayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:960: kālabhedenecchayā santi na santi ceti siddhāntapakṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:971: āsateti copayantīti vā coditatvaṃ satralakṣaṇamiti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:972: tathā dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanādarśanānniyatakartṛkatvāvagamena dvirātrādivadahīnatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ //12 // //13 // //14//
GSP33brsgor4u:981: sa ekadhā tridhā pañcadhetyādiśrutyā viduṣa evānekadhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:986: yadyapi mūlapradīpasya vartyantareṣūtpannadīpānāṃ cātyantabhedo 'sti liṅgasya tu dehabhedakṛto bhedo na svataḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:989: tathāpi pradīpatvajātyaikyena vyaktiṣvaikyāropāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:990: tathāca yathā pradīpo 'naikavartiṣu praviśati evaṃ vidyāyogabalādvidvaliṅgasya vyāpitvādanekadeheṣu yugapadāveśa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:993: yadanādi mana ekadehasthaṃ tadanusārīṇi dehāntarasthāpi manāṃsi bhavanti tadavasthānāṃ tanniyamyatvasaṃbhavāditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:995: nirmāṇacittānyasmitāmātrātpravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittamekamanekeṣāmiti hi bhagavatpatañjalinā sūtritam /
GSP33brsgor4u:1004: na tu taddvitīyamastīti kvacitsuṣuptimadhikṛtyoktaṃ 'tatkena kam'ityādi kvacinmuktiṃ prakṛtyoktam /
GSP33brsgor4u:1005: evaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvavacanaṃ suṣuptimuktyanyatarāpekṣaṃ saguṇopāsakasya bhogoktau na virudhyate bhinnaviṣayatvādityāha-svāpyayeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1008: atra samutthānādivākyaṃ muktiviṣayaṃ yatra suptā iti suptiviṣayamiti vibhāgaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor4u:1017: siddhānte tu vidyāyogināmīśvaraniyamyatvādekasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasyaiva jagatkartṛtvasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1018: pralayātsargasamaye yasyekṣaṇapūrvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ śrutau prakṛtaṃ tasyaiva niyantṛtvādirjagadvyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1023: ekaṃ pratyanyeṣāṃ guṇatve tveka eveśvara ityāha-samanaskatvāditi //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:1028: adhikāre niyojayatyādityādīnityādhikārikaḥ, sa cāsau maṇḍalasthaśca tasya prāpyatvokterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1029: manasaspatiḥ sūryamaṇḍalāntaḥsthaḥ paramātmā 'tat saviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
GSP33brsgor4u:1031: tathāca yadi pūrvaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ svārājyamuktaṃ syāttarhi īśvarasyāgre prāpyatāṃ na brūyāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:1032: ato bhoge svārājyaṃ na jagajjanmādiṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1038: vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha | BBs_4,4.19 |
GSP33brsgor4u:1045: yathā jñānābhāvānnirguṇaṃ na prāptaṃ tathā dhyānābhāvājjagatsraṣṭṛtvādi na prāpyate /
GSP33brsgor4u:1051: tamupāsakaṃ brahmalokagatamāha-hiraṇyagarbhaḥ mayā khalvimā āpo amṛtarūpā mīyante bhujyante tavāpyasau loko 'mṛtodakalakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1064: bādarāyaṇapadena badarikāśramavāsoktyā nityasarvajñasya paramagurornārāyaṇasya prasādadyotanāttapraṇītaśāstre niravadyatāṃ dyotayati /
GSP33brsgor4u:1065: saguṇavidyāyāḥ sātiśayaphalatve 'pi tato nirguṇavidyānāvṛttirityāha-anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:1066: ye brahmalokaṃ gacchanti te taṃ prāpya nāvartante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1068: ito 'smātpṛthivīlokāttṛtīyasyāṃ divi yo brahmalokastasminnara iti ṇya iti cārṇakatulyau sudhāhṛdāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1069: airamannamayaṃ, madīyaṃ madakaraṃ saraḥ, somasavanaḥ amṛtavarṣī /
GSP33brsgor4u:1070: yadyapi teṣāmiha na punarāvṛttirimaṃ mānavamiti ca śrutiṣvihemamiti viśeṣaṇādasminkalpe brahmalokaṃ gatānāṃ kalpāntare āvṛttirbhāti,
GSP33brsgor4u:1072: ye tu daharādīśvaropāstyā gatāsteṣāṃ saguṇavidyāphalakṣaye 'pi niravagraheśvarānugrahalabdhātmajñānānmuktiriti niyama ityabhipretyāha-antavattve 'pi tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1073: nanvatra sūtrakṛtā saguṇavidāmevānāvṛttikrama ukto na nirguṇavidāṃ tatra ko heturityāśaṅkya teṣāmāvṛttiśaṅkābhāvādityāha-samyagiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1076: ataḥ svata eva samyagdarśināmāvṛttiśaṅkā neti kimu vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1079: evaṃ samanvayoktyā brahmātmaikyasya vedāntapramāṇakatvamavadhārayituṃ vākyārthajñāne smṛtitarkādisarvaprakāravirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:1084: śārīkasya bhāṣyasya kṛtā vyākhyā satāṃ mude //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:1087: vakṣasyakṣṇośca pārśve karatalayugale kaustubhābhāṃ dayāṃ ca sītāṃ kodaṇḍadīkṣāmabhayavarayutāṃ vīkṣya rāmāṅgasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1088: svasyāḥ kva syāditīyaṃ hṛdi kṛtamananā bhāṣyaratnaprabhākhyā,
GSP33brsgor4u:1090_1: śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
